revised_title: Satellite Observations for Surface Albedo Research in Climate Studies
tldr: This paper discusses the importance of surface albedo in the Earth's climate system and how satellite observations can be used to improve albedo measurements for climate research. It highlights the challenges in establishing a global albedo dataset and the different approaches to categorize and monitor surface albedo. The paper also reviews the use of satellite-derived albedo measurements in various climate models and their potential improvements.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Climate Science
